name: Vegan Blueberry Muffin Energy Bites
description: Vegan Blueberry Muffin Energy Bites, 1 Bowl 15 Minute. 8 Ingredient Blueberry energy balls for Snacking. Gluten-free Grain-free Soyfree Recipe , Nutfree option in notes
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup smooth cashew  butter (or use almond butter)
3 tbsp coconut flour  (or use oat flour)
1 tbsp chia seeds ((optional), or add other small seeds of choice)

recipeInstructions.text: Measure out the ingredients and keep ready. Let the nut butter sit for 10 mins to come to room temperature, or warm in a bowl in microwave. Mix nut butter, sugar, lemon, vanilla and salt in a bowl until well incorporated. (Nut butters can stiffen quickly and mixing will take longer depending on the type of nut butter and ambient temperature)
recipeInstructions.name: Measure out the ingredients and keep ready. Let the nut butter sit for 10 mins to come to room temperature, or warm in a bowl in microwave. Mix nut butter, sugar, lemon, vanilla and salt in a bowl until well incorporated. (Nut butters can stiffen quickly and mixing will take longer depending on the type of nut butter and ambient temperature)

recipeInstructions.text: Add flours and mix in, Add the chia and blueberries and mix into a soft dough
recipeInstructions.name: Add flours and mix in, Add the chia and blueberries and mix into a soft dough

recipeInstructions.text: Roll into balls using hands or use cookie scoop to shape. Store on the counter for the day, refrigerate for upto a week and freeze for a month.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll into balls using hands or use cookie scoop to shape. Store on the counter for the day, refrigerate for upto a week and freeze for a month.

keywords: blueberry energy bites, blueberry muffin bites, blueberry muffin energy balls, vegan blueberry energy bites
